ai.grakn.graql.admin

Interface PatternAdmin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Pattern
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Conjunction<T>, Disjunction<T>, VarAdmin

    public interface PatternAdmin
extends Pattern
    Admin class for inspecting and manipulating a Pattern
    Author:
    Felix Chapman

      • Methods inherited from interface ai.grakn.graql.Pattern

        admin

    • Method Detail

      • getDisjunctiveNormalForm

        Disjunction<Conjunction<VarAdmin>> getDisjunctiveNormalForm()
        Get the disjunctive normal form of this pattern group. This means the pattern group will be transformed into a number of conjunctive patterns, where each is disjunct. e.g. p = (A or B) and (C or D) p.getDisjunctiveNormalForm() = (A and C) or (A and D) or (B and C) or (B and D)
        Returns:
        the pattern group in disjunctive normal form

      • commonVarNames

        Set<VarName> commonVarNames()
        Get all common, user-defined variable names in the pattern.

      • isDisjunction

        default boolean isDisjunction()
        Returns:
        true if this Pattern.Admin is a Conjunction

      • isConjunction

        default boolean isConjunction()
        Returns:
        true if this Pattern.Admin is a Disjunction

      • isVar

        default boolean isVar()
        Returns:
        true if this Pattern.Admin is a Var.Admin

      • asDisjunction

        default Disjunction<?> asDisjunction()
        Returns:
        this Pattern.Admin as a Disjunction, if it is one.

      • asConjunction

        default Conjunction<?> asConjunction()
        Returns:
        this Pattern.Admin as a Conjunction, if it is one.

      • asVar

        default VarAdmin asVar()
        Returns:
        this Pattern.Admin as a Var.Admin, if it is one.

      • getVars

        default Set<VarAdmin> getVars()
        Returns:
        all variables referenced in the pattern
